page.title: 14RECREATION IN FORDYCE AREA
page.content: Of the 20 families we studied,there were 84 people altogether-39 adults(20 mothers,19 fathers)45 children(23 girls,22 boys) 7 fathers,3 mothers,5 boys & 2 girls had no hobbies. Below is listed the various hobbies in order of popularity: Fathers' Hobbies:Gardening,Snooker, Farming,Fishing,Sheepdog Training, Do-it-Yourself,Darts and Golf. Mothers'Hobbies:Knitting,Sewing,Baking Gardening,Keep-fit and Cooking. Boys'hobbies:Fishing,Snooker,Cycling, Football,Collecting Cacti/Cars, Drawing,Motorcars,Cooking,Horses and Badminton. Girls'Hobbies:Collecting Dolls/Stamps/ China/Rubbers,Dancing,Music, Reading,Snooker,Cooking and Pets.
